please check FFXIVCORE.com

or to anyone who is game enough, go to your local game store, open the cases for ffxiv and grab the buddy passes from the cases.

Most stores wont take them out, only the disk.

Also, for those of you who dont know, FFXIV buddy pass is a FULL VERSION ACCOUNT.
